WHO IS KNAR?

I have always been very interested in technology and art. I was first majoring in engineering, however, when I fell in love with coding, I changed my major and found the most fulfilling field for me. I am doing yoga for 4 years. I am a beginner flutist and I am learning to play the guitar. I also like literature and philosophy. I believe art and technology are very similar in the sense of creating and analyzing. To my mind, coding is the art of structuring your thoughts and implementing them to solve problems, therefore code always reflects the coder’s mind. I am especially passionate about development because it allows my ideas and creativity to be implemented and become useful.

2018 - 2021

Bachelor of Computer Science

Amenican University of Armenia

I took courses in Object Oriented Programming, Data Structures, Algorithms, Software Development and Machine Learning. My bachelor's degree helps me to write better code and to think in a problem solving oriented way.

2020

Re:Coded Front-End Web Development Bootcamp

Istanbul

Without any previous knowledge, I participated in 5 months intensive training on web development. I achieved to learn and practice CSS, HTML, Javascript and React.

Fall 2020

Peer Mentoring

American University of Armenia

I mentored the freshman students. I guided them through their adaptation to the university and persuing their careers

2019

Data Science Summer School

American University of Armenia

I have attended to courses to learn about the core principles of data science, machine learning and artificial intelligence.
